cab.content: ^ 3 a) litary Secret. 647 From Viceroy, Army Department, 7th July 1917. (Received at India Office, 11 a.m., 8th.) , 10080. Mahsud operations. Nothing of importance to report; force hasremained unmolested in Boji Khel Camp since - 30th June. Health Britishtroops fair, Indian troops good.. . ' .
